headline.main: Bahrain Moves to Dissolve Main Opposition Group
headline.print_headline: Bahrain Moves to Dissolve Main Opposition Group

lead_paragraph: Bahrain's justice ministry took steps on Monday to dissolve a major opposition group it accuses of supporting terrorism, state news agency BNA reported, filing a lawsuit the group said was an attempt by the government to stamp out dissent.
snippet: Bahrain's justice ministry took steps on Monday to dissolve a major opposition group it accuses of supporting terrorism, state news agency BNA reported, filing a lawsuit the group said was an attempt by the government to stamp out dissent....
